title: Jurist
summary: A jurist is a person with expert knowledge of law;  someone who analyses and comments on law.[1][2]  This person is usually a specialist legal scholarâ€”not necessarily with a formal qualification in law or a legal practitioner, although in the United States the term "jurist" may be applied to a judge.[3] With reference to Roman law, a "jurist" (in English) is a jurisconsult (jurisconsulta).[4]
